channel.title: CVE Feed for OTRS AG -- ((OTRS)) Community Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OTRS AG -- ((OTRS)) Community Edition

item.title: CVE-2021-36091|2024-08-04T00:47:43.812Z -- otrs%20ag -- %28%28otrs%29%29%20community%20edition
item.description: Agents are able to list appointments in the calendars without required permissions. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition: 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS: 7.0.x versions prior to 7.0.27.

item.title: CVE-2021-36092|2024-08-04T00:47:43.823Z -- otrs%20ag -- %28%28otrs%29%29%20community%20edition
item.description: It's possible to create an email which contains specially crafted link and it can be used to perform XSS attack. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition:6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS: 7.0.x version 7.0.27 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.14 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2021-36093|2024-08-04T00:47:43.937Z -- otrs%20ag -- %28%28otrs%29%29%20community%20edition
item.description: It's possible to create an email which can be stuck while being processed by PostMaster filters, causing DoS. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.28 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.15 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2021-36095|2024-08-04T00:47:43.852Z -- otrs%20ag -- %28%28otrs%29%29%20community%20edition
item.description: Malicious attacker is able to find out valid user logins by using the "lost password" feature. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.28 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2021-36096|2024-08-04T00:47:43.808Z -- otrs%20ag -- %28%28otrs%29%29%20community%20edition
item.description: Generated Support Bundles contains private S/MIME and PGP keys if containing folder is not hidden. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.28 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.15 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2021-36094|2024-08-04T00:47:43.810Z -- otrs%20ag -- %28%28otrs%29%29%20community%20edition
item.description: It's possible to craft a request for appointment edit screen, which could lead to the XSS attack. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS)) Community Edition 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.28 and prior versions.
